dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Good morning, Dr. Leticia Salvador. Ako si Atty. Miguel Ramos. Kailangan po namin ng autopsy report ni Leo Mendoza para sa legal case.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Ah, Atty. Ramos. Para sa autopsy report, kailangan ninyo ng proper authorization. May court order ba kayo?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Wala pa po kaming court order. Pero under Republic Act No. 6713, may karapatan kaming mag-access ng public records para sa legal proceedings. Under Rule 130 ng Rules of Court, kailangan namin yung medical evidence para sa defense.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Sige, pero may warning ako. Yung report ay confidential under medical confidentiality laws. Under Rule 130, Section 24, may privilege ang medical records, pero may exception para sa legal proceedings.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Understood po. Para lang sa legal proceedings. May nakita po ba kayong unusual sa autopsy findings?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Oo. May mga inconsistencies sa official police report versus yung actual findings ko.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Ano po yung mga inconsistencies, Dr. Salvador?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Una, yung time of death. Police report says 11 PM, pero based sa rigor mortis at algor mortis, mas likely na 9 PM.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Pangalawa, may defensive wounds sa kamay ni Leo - consistent sa self-defense, hindi suicide.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Pangatlo, may ligature marks sa wrists - parang na-restrain siya bago pinatay.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Defensive wounds? Meaning nag-fight back si Leo?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Oo. May bruising sa knuckles, parang nakipag-suntukan. At yung gunshot wound pattern, hindi consistent sa police training.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: May iba pa po bang findings na hindi nasama sa official report?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Oo. May foreign DNA sa fingernails ni Leo. Hindi niya yung DNA. At may evidence ng struggle na hindi documented sa police report.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Actually, may nakita akong notebook sa pocket ni Leo. May mga notes about police operations. Kinuha ng police evidence team, pero may photos ako ng ilang pages.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Pwede po ba naming makita yung autopsy report at yung photos? Kailangan namin yan para sa chain of custody.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Sige, pero may condition. Kapag ginamit mo yan sa court, dapat ako yung mag-testify bilang expert witness. Hindi ko pwedeng i-allow na i-misrepresent yung findings ko.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Of course po. Kailangan namin yung medical expert testimony para sa defense under Rule 130.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Good. Eto yung complete autopsy report at yung photos ng notebook pages. Pero remember, confidential yan. Hindi pwedeng i-leak sa media.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Salamat po, Dr. Leticia Salvador. May sapat na ebidensya na kami para sa korte.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Welcome. Si Leo ay mabuting pulis. Deserve niya ng justice.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Okay na siguro 'to para sa korte.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Sandali lang.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: May pupuntahan pa ako na baka makatulong din sa kaso.
